1.title: The Rainbow Salad
1.plot: Fluffed with pride, Tallulah invites Marge, a viewer whose life she saved, onto the show but her new Producer Holster had hoped for a guest with more twitter followers.

2.title: How to Make Hot Water, Lemon and Honey
2.plot: Much to Tallulah's surprise, Marge is back and she's trending. Jealousy ensues.

3.title: How to Stew Rhubarb
3.plot: Tallulah makes stewed rhubarb with her eyes closed, only to discover there's a mime in her kitchen.

4.title: How to Make a Ham Sandwich
4.plot: After a French Can Can girl steals the show, Tallulah begs Holster for just one episode she can do according to her vision.

5.title: The Tomato Soup Sandwich
5.plot: Tallulah threatens to quit the show when her attempts at melodrama and high art are thwarted by a cat.

6.title: The Banana Sandwich
6.plot: While making a left handed banana sandwich, Tallulah reveals she has found a true benefactor.

7.title: The Poached Eggs
7.plot: With her benefactor gone, Tallulah pulls out all the stops to woo Holster back to the show.

8.title: The Pita Sandwich
8.plot: While Tallulah celebrates her new trending status, Holster plots how to exploit a budding twitter romance.

imdb.plot outline: Reaching her mid thirties and realizing that she has yet to attain anything like the glamorous heights she had envisioned for herself, Tallulah, a mime and freelance tour director, inadvertently oversells her chef skills to land the job of an online cooking show host. Certain this show will be her launchpad to stardom and the proof of how wrong her ex was for ever letting her go, Tallulah forges forward with the outer confidence of Julia Childs never bothering herself with the truth that she's teaching her audience recipes so easy a child could do them. But when her attempt to tackle a recipe with more than 3 ingredients coincides with news that her ex just doesn't care, it proves to be too much for Tallulah and she has an epic on air meltdown that only her off beat Argentinean camera man can pull her back from. Luckily, her vulnerability and valiant attempts to pull herself together prove to be the key to her success, when her on air actions inspire a suicidal woman to reclaim her life and her kitchen. Armed with a new sense of purpose, far beyond the need to impress an Ex, Tallulah is now ready to save the world, one sandwich at a time.
imdb.title: Feathers and Toast
plot: Reaching her mid thirties and realizing that she has yet to attain anything like the glamorous heights she had envisioned for herself, Tallulah, a mime and freelance tour director, inadvertently oversells her chef skills to land the job of an online cooking show host. Certain this show will be her launchpad to stardom and the proof of how wrong her ex was for ever letting her go, Tallulah forges forward with the outer confidence of Julia Childs never bothering herself with the truth that she's teaching her audience recipes so easy a child could do them. But when her attempt to tackle a recipe with more than 3 ingredients coincides with news that her ex just doesn't care, it proves to be too much for Tallulah and she has an epic on air meltdown that only her off beat Argentinean camera man can pull her back from. Luckily, her vulnerability and valiant attempts to pull herself together prove to be the key to her success, when her on air actions inspire a suicidal woman to reclaim her life and her kitchen. Armed with a new sense of purpose, far beyond the need to impress an Ex, Tallulah is now ready to save the world, one sandwich at a time.::Mhairi Morrison & Holly Payberg
